app_descript:
App Name: Baby Pics - Baby Photo exploring different themes each month, adding extra charm and character to your baby's pictures.

Brief: Capture and cherish those adorable milestone moments of your little one with Baby Pics - Baby Photo Editor. This app offers a delightful way to commemorate the monthly achievements of your baby, from their first smile to those tiny baby steps. Tailor-make each snapshot with a plethora of visually impressive frames, artistic textures, and user-friendly editing tools to create lasting memories of your baby‚Äôs growth journey.
